content.raw:
As for the visuals URI, I think it's ok to leave it as is if it's going to be too much trouble. We can ticket an issue for it if we want.

The bad display of innerxml is something we had realized early on. Given that the left panel will be completely redesigned soon(ish), I think we can leave it like that for now. If you have a nice idea on how to fix it quickly though, go ahead :)

I can't think of anything for the last point right now. I'll take a closer look at the code and let you know if I think of anything.
content.html:
As for the visuals URI, I think it's ok to leave it as is if it's going to be too much trouble. We can ticket an issue for it if we want.

The bad display of innerxml is something we had realized early on. Given that the left panel will be completely redesigned soon(ish), I think we can leave it like that for now. If you have a nice idea on how to fix it quickly though, go ahead :)

I can't think of anything for the last point right now. I'll take a closer look at the code and let you know if I think of anything.
